Why we need to take a deeper look https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/liam-dann-the-most-brutal-brutal-coronic-statistic-statistic-and-why-we-need-to-take-a-a-deeper-look/5pfxumklo5pfxumklo5amtdtl5amtdtl5ivegoe5iqe5iq/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/liam-dann-the-most-brutal-brutal-coronic-statistic-statistic-and-why-we-need-to-take-a-a-deeper-look/5pfxumklo5pfxumklo5amtdtl5amtdtl5ivegoe5iqe5iq/ Liam DannOPINION: When inflation bites, we all feel it. But losing your job is personal. Sat, 08 Feb 2025 16:00:00 +0000 If unemployment peaks at 5.4%, as currently expected, it is unlikely to be one of the statistics that troubles economists and commentators this year. But there are real costs involved - personally and for society.
